API Ref cruise.py¶

Author: Norland Raphael Hagen <norlandrhagen@gmail.com> Date: 07-23-2021

cmapdata - cruise - cruise metadata and trajectory functionallity.

ingest.cruise.ST_bounds_from_df(df)¶

Retrieve ST bounds from input dataframe with time/lat/lon

ingest.cruise.add_ID_trajectory_df(trajectory_df, cruise_name, server)¶

Adds Cruise_ID column to a trajectory dataframe

Parameters

  • trajectory_df (Pandas DataFrame) – Input dataframe containing time/lat/lon cols.

  • cruise_name (str) – Valid CMAP cruise name (UNOLS ex. KM1906)

  • server (str) – [description]

Returns

Trajectory df with Cruise_ID column added

Return type

Pandas DataFrame

ingest.cruise.add_ST_cols_to_metadata_df(metadata_df, trajectory_df)¶

Adds Space-Time columns to metadata df from trajectory df

Parameters

  • metadata_df (Pandas DataFrame) – cruise specific metadata df for tblCruise

  • trajectory_df (Pandas DataFrame) – cruise specific trajectory df for tblCruise_Trajectory

Returns

cruise specific metadata df for tblCruise with ST columns added.

Return type

Pandas DataFrame

ingest.cruise.build_cruise_metadata_from_user_input(df)¶

Attempts to build cruise_metadata dataframe from input trajectory metadata + user input. Recomended to ingest via cruise template instead.

Parameters

df (Pandas DataFrame) – Input dataset dataframe with time/lat/lon.

Returns

Pandas dataframe for tblCruise ingestion. string: cruise_name

Return type

Pandas Dataframe

ingest.cruise.clean_cruise_traj(cruise_name)¶

cleans cruise trajectory from r2r

ingest.cruise.download_all_cruises()¶

webscraping

ingest.cruise.download_cruise_data_from_url(cruise_name, download_url_str, dataset_category)¶

webscraping helper function for downloading from url

ingest.cruise.download_hot_cruises()¶

webscraping

ingest.cruise.fill_ST_bounds_metadata(cruise_name)¶

ST filler func for webscraping - old

ingest.cruise.fill_ST_meta(cruise_meta_df, cruise_traj_df)¶

webscraping

ingest.cruise.format_cruise_metadata(cruise_name, cruise_nickname, cruise_shipname, chief_sci)¶

webscraping formatting

ingest.cruise.gather_cruise_links()¶

webscraping

ingest.cruise.get_chief_sci(cmdf)¶

webscraping chief sci

ingest.cruise.get_cruise_data(cmdf, cruise_name)¶

old webscraping script

ingest.cruise.get_cruise_metadata(cmdf, cruise_name)¶

webscraping r2r metadata

ingest.cruise.get_cruise_traj(cmdf, cruise_name)¶

old webscraping trajectory downloading from r2r

ingest.cruise.parse_cruise_metadata(cruise_name='', cruise_url='')¶

webscraping

ingest.cruise.parse_r2r_page(url)¶

webscraping

ingest.cruise.resample_trajectory(df, interval='1min')¶

Resamples a cruise trajectory dataframe based on given interval. Default is one minute. Use cases are downsampling super high temporal resolution. ex. GPS.

Parameters

  • df (Pandas DataFrame) – Input dataset dataframe with time/lat/lon.

  • interval (str, optional) – valid pandas resample() interval. Defaults to “1min”.

Returns

Resampled Pandas DataFrame

Return type

Pandas DataFrame

ingest.cruise.return_cruise_trajectory_from_df(df, Cruise_ID)¶

Returns a Pandas DataFrame of time/lat/lon from input dataframe and cruise_ID

ingest.cruise.trim_returned_link(link_str)¶

webscraping helper func for triming strings

ingest.cruise.update_tblCruises(server)¶

old webscraping updating func

ingest.cruise.vault_cruises()¶

Returns cruise dirs from r2r_cruise dir in vault_structure
